name: Lemon drop martini
description: Mix vodka, lemon juice and triple sec, shaken with ice to make this refreshing lemon drop cocktail. Dip the rim of the glass in sugar to impress party guests
keywords: Alcoholic drinks, Cocktail, lemon drop, Lemon juice, Miriam Nice, triple sec, Vodka

recipeInstructions.text: Put 1 martini glass in the fridge to chill. Mix the white caster sugar with the finely grated zest of the lemon, and set aside.
Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker and add the triple sec, lemon juice and a handful of ice. Shake really well until the outside of the shaker feels cold.
Dip the rim of the chilled glass in water, shake off the excess then dip into the sugar and lemon zest mix.
Strain the contents of the shaker into your prepared glass and enjoy.
